name: K-Drama & Asian Series Index (V2)
description: Curated sources specializing in high-quality Korean and international dramas and TV shows.
author: Kiyomi Community Content

providers.name: Nyaa (Asian Series)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Excellent for fan-subbed, raw, and niche Asian series and documentaries.

providers.name: The Pirate Bay (General/Archival)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: A general index useful for finding established or internationally popular K-Dramas.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: Knaben (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern, fast search API offering structured results, including many East Asian releases.

providers.name: TorrentsCSV (Aggregated Data)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Aggregates data from diverse sources, helping locate obscure or older niche K-Drama files.

providers.name: UIndex
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: UIndex is primarily a BitTorrent tracker site, similar to Russian tracker RuTracker.org. You can find the latest Asian drama content here!
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.
